name: Seeing Beyond Disabilities: Unique Insights
description: An exhibition partnering the Waisman Center, VSA Wisconsin, and Artworking with the McPherson Eye Research Institute, showcasing works by artists of all abilities: - The Harvey A. Stevens International Collection of Art by People with Developmental Disabilities, Friends of the Waisman Center - VSA Wisconsin associated artists Jerome Glenn, Joyce Gust, Robert Hanneman, Nicole Pollex, Albert Schmiege, Dan Sullivan & Ron Wendt - Artworking associated artists Phil Porter & Matt Ward
locationAddress: 9th floor Vision Gallery, Wisconsin Institutes for Medical Research
